dialog_1.name: Unknown
dialog_1.text: Hello young man, My name is Lee Kuan Yew.

dialog_2.name: Lee Kuan Yew
dialog_2.text: Would you be kind enough to help me run some errand?

dialog_3.name: Lee Kuan Yew
dialog_3.text: Great! Here is $30. Please help me invest in our key industries.

instru_2.text: Assigned objective 1965.1 by Lee Kuan Yew
